name: Devesh Sonpure
headline: Consulting & Transformation Leader | Risk, Regulatory & Digit Transformation
about:
I am a consulting and transformation leader with close to two decades of experience supporting global banks and enterprise clients through complex change initiatives. My work has primarily focused on risk and regulatory transformation, enterprise governance, data-led reporting modernisation, and productivity improvement through automation.
Over the years, I have worked closely with senior stakeholders across risk, compliance, operations, and technology to help organisations move from fragmented, manual processes to more structured and scalable operating models. Much of my experience sits at the intersection of regulatory expectations, business reality, and delivery constraints.
I am particularly drawn to transformation work where clarity, prioritisation, and disciplined execution matter more than theoretical frameworks.
